summary: You will be able to craft arrows at the forge.
descriptionHtml:
Download the \"NEWEST ArrowCrafting\" for the updated version.

You will be able to craft arrows at the forge in 2 different stacks 25 and 50.

The arrows are under the Misc tab when u are at the forge !

Recipe
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Iron arrows(25): 5 firewood, 5 leather strips, 1 iron ingot.
Iron arrows(50): 10 firewood, 10 leather strips, 2 iron ingot.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steel arrow(25): 5 firewood, 5 leather strips, 1 steel ingot.
Steel arrow(50): 10 firewood, 10 leather strips, 2 steel ingot.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Elven arrow(25):  5 firewood, 5 leather strips, 1 moonstone ingot.
Elven arrow(50):  10 firewood, 10 leather strips, 2 moonstone ingot.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Glass arrows(25): 5 firewood, 5 leather strips, 1 malachite ingot.
Glass arrows(50): 10 firewood, 10 leather strips, 2 malachite ingot.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dwarven arrow(25):  5 firewood, 5 leather strips, 1 dwarven ingot.
Dwarven arrow(50):  10 firewood, 10 leather strips, 2 dwarven ingot.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Orcish arrow(25):  5 firewood, 5 leather strips, 1 orichalcum ingot.
Orcish arrow(50):  10 firewood, 10 leather strips, 2 orichalcum ingot.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ebony arrow(25):  5 firewood, 5 leather strips, 1 ebony ingot.
Ebony arrow(50):  10 firewood, 10 leather strips, 2 ebony ingot.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Daedric arrow(50):  10 firewood, 10 leather strips, 3 ebony ingot, 1 daedric heart.
Daedric arrow(100):  20 firewood, 20 leather strips, 6 ebony ingot, 2 daedric heart.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Installation:

Drop the file in your Data folder and then activate it in the launcher under Data files.

ex: D:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Uninstall:

Delete the file.
author: Sers94
